inclusion.criterion: Male or female between the ages of 18 and 75 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Signed written informed consent by subject's representative
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Current diagnosis of chronic liver disease with cirrhosis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Elevated venous ammonia concentration, defined as a value above the normal range at the local laboratory
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Estimated creatinine clearance of > 30 mL/min/1.73m², calculated using the Cockcroft-Gault formula, or serum creatinine < 2.5 mg/dL [Cockcroft-Gault formula: creatinine clearance = (140 - age) x weight in kg divided by (72 x serum creatinine in mg/dL); multiply result by 0.85 for females]
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate urinary output of ≥ 30 mL/hour for the last 2 hours if estimated creatinine clearance is < 50 mL/min/1.73 m²
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative pregnancy test or documented sterilization procedure (tubal ligation or hysterectomy) or 5 years post-menopausal
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Major gastrointestinal bleeding (hematemesis, melena, or hematochezia) requiring blood transfusion within the last 24 hours
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled sepsis, as defined by hemodynamic instability requiring vasopressor agents (renal-dosed dopamine allowed)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current diagnosis of acute hepatic failure
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of probenecid, valproate, penicillin or its derivatives, or corticosteroids (oral or IV) within the last 24 hours
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 55-year-old man with Parkinson's disease. He has hypertension and hypercholesterolemia in his past medical history.
